product_desc:
Unlike any other project management, task management, or business execution application available today, LifeDashboard is designed to “make you better and what you do.”  It does this by tracking the user’s behavior in online “worksessions” or on their mobile device, constantly scoring and providing encouragement for positive behavior and penalties for negative behavior.

By doing so, LifeDashboard encourages the user to accomplish more and move forward towards accomplishing their meaningful objectives, which inevitably leads to increased success.  LD encourages and rewards ACTIONS.

On an Enterprise level, LifeDashboard uses the same mechanism not just to encourage good behavior within the workforce, but also to offer management a quantitative and reliable measurement for the worker’s performance, without the need for subjective evaluations.
high_concept: High performance execution cockpit, linked into a new type of social enterprise
name: LifeDashboard
